keys: Matemáticas. Forma. Espacio. Páginas web relevantes

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>451</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Shape and Space Crossword</string>
            <string language="es">Crucigrama sobre forma y espacio</string>
            <string language="ga">Crosfhocal faoi Spás agus Cruth</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Form-und Platz-Kreuzworträtsel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mots croisé de forme et d'espace</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Crossword da forma e do espaço</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Parole incrociate dello spazio e di figura</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μορφή και διαστημικό σταυρόλεξο</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A challenging crossword designed for children who have mastered the concepts involved in shape and space. a good knowledge of the terminology involved is required.</string>
            <string language="es">Un crucigrama difícil diseñado para que los niños conozcan los conceptos relacionados con la forma y el espacio. Se requiere un buen conocimiento de la terminología relacionada.</string>
            <string language="ga">Crosfhocal dúshlánach a dearadh do leanaí a bhfuil máistreacht acu ar na coincheapanna atá i gceist le cruth agus spás.  Tá eolas maith ar théarmaíocht ag teastáil.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Maths</string>
            <string language="es">Matemáticas. Forma. Espacio. Páginas web relevantes</string>
            <string language="ga">Mata</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ShapeSpace</string>
            <string language="ga">Cruth Spás</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Relevant Websites</string>
            <string language="ga">Láithreáin Ghréasáin Bhainteacha</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein schwieriges Kreuzworträtsel konzipierte für
Kinder, die die Konzepte erarbeitet haben, die in Form und in Platz 
mit einbezogen werden. ein gutes Wissen der betroffenen 
Terminologie wird benoetigt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Des mots croisé provocants ont conçu pour les 
enfants qui ont maîtrisé les concepts impliqués dans la forme et 
l'espace. une bonne connaissance de la terminologie impliquée 
est exigée.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um crossword challenging projetou para as 
crianças que dominaram os conceitos envolvidos na forma e no espaço.
um conhecimento bom da terminologia envolvida é requerido.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lle parole incrociate challenging hanno 
progettato per i bambini che hanno acquistato padronanza dei concetti 
coinvolgere nella figura e nello spazio. una buona conoscenza 
della terminologia in questione è richiesta.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα σταυρόλεξο πρόκλησης που σχεδιάζεται για τα 
παιδιά που έχουν κυριαρχήσει τις έννοιες που περιλαμβάνονται στη 
μορφή και το διάστημα. μια καλή γνώση της ορολογίας που 
περιλαμβάνεται απαιτείται.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mathe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">ShapeSpace</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Relevante Web site</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">ShapeSpace</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Maths</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ShapeSpace</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Web site Relevantes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
